nplcit.text: KUMAR ET AL.: 'AKT Crystal Structure and AKT Specific Inhibitors' ONCOGENE vol. 24, 2005, pages 7493 - 7501

abstract.p: The instant invention provides for substituted naphthyridine compounds that inhibit Akt activity. In particular, the compounds disclosed selectively inhibit one or two of the Akt isoforms. The invention also provides for compositions comprising such inhibitory compounds and methods of inhibiting Akt activity by administering the compound to a patient in need of treatment of cancer.

La présente invention concerne des composés de naphthyridine substitués qui inhibent l'activité Akt. En particulier, les composés de cette invention permettent d'inhiber sélectivement au moins deux des isoformes Akt. L'invention concerne également des compositions renfermant de tels composés inhibiteurs et des procédés inhibant l'activité Akt par administration du composé à un patient nécessitant un traitement contre le cancer.

claim.claim-text: WHAT IS CLAIMED IS:
1. A compound according to Formula A:
<EMI ID=71.1> wherein:
E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L and M are independently selected from: C or N, wherein each E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L and M is optionally substituted with Rl ;
a is 0 or 1; b is 0 or 1; m is 0, 1 or 2; p is independently 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5;
Ring X is a 3-7 membered cycloalkyl or 4-7 membered heterocyclyl optionally substituted with one to five R3;
Ring Y is 4-7 membered cycloalkyl or a 5-7 membered heterocyclyl optionally substituted with one to four R4;
Ring Z is selected from: (C3-C8)cycloalkyl, aryl, heteroaryl and heterocyclyl;

Rl is independently selected from: H, oxo, (C=O)3Ob(Ci -C io)alkyl, (C=O)aOb-aryl, (C=0)aOb(C2-Cio)alkenyl, (C=O)aOb (C2-C io)alkynyl, CO2H, halo, OH, Ob(Q- C6)perfluoroalkyl, (C=O)aNR7R8, CN, (C=O)aOb(C3-C8)cycloalkyl, S(O)mNR7R8, SH, S(0)m-(Ci-Cio)alkyl and (C=O)aOb-heterocyclyl, said alkyl, aryl, alkenyl, alkynyl, cycloalkyl, and heterocyclyl is optionally substituted with one or more substituents selected from R6;

R4 is independently selected from: oxo, (C=0)aOb(Ci-Cio)alkyl, (C=O)aOb-aryl, (C=0)aOb(C2-Cio)alkenyl, (C=O)aOb (C2-Cio)alkynyl, CO2H, halo, OH, Ob(Ci- C6)perfluoroalkyl, (C=O)aNR7R8, CN, (C=O)aOb(C3-C8)cycloalkyl, SH, S(O)mNR7R8,

or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt or a stereoisomer thereof.

5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]octan-2-amine; l-{8-[4-(2-amino-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]oct-2-yl)phenyl]-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-f]-l,6- naphthyridin-3-yl}-2-methylpropan-2-ol;
2-[4-(3-tert-butyl-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-f]-l,6-naphthyridin-8-yl)phenyl]-5,8- dioxaspiro[3.4]octan-2-amine;
8-[4-(2-Amino-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]oct-2-yl)phenyl]-N-ethyl-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6- naphthyridin-3-amine; and
N'-{8-[4-(2-amino-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]oct-2-yl)phenyl]-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6- naphthyridm-3-yl}-N,N-dimethylpropane-l,3-diamine;
or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt or stereoisomer thereof.

8. A compound which is: 2-{4-[3-(l-methyl-lH-imidazol-4-yl)-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6-naphthyridin-8- yl]phenyl}-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]octan-2-amine; or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof.
9. A compound which is: 8-[4-(2-Amino-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]oct-2-yl)phenyl]-N-ethyl-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6- naphthyridin-3-amine; or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof.

10. A compound which is: N'-{8-[4-(2-amino-5,8-dioxaspiro[3.4]oct-2-yl)phenyl]-9-phenyl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6- naphthyridin-3-yl} -N,N-dimethylpropane- 1 ,3-diamine; or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof.
11. A compound which is: 2-[4-(9-phenyl-3-pyrimidin-2-yl[l,2,4]triazolo[3,4-/J-l,6-naphthyridin-8-yl)phenyl]-5,8- dioxaspiro[3.4]octan-2-amine; or a pharmaceutically acceptable salt thereof.
12. A pharmaceutical composition comprising a pharmaceutical carrier, and dispersed therein, a therapeutically effective amount of a compound of Claim 1.
13. The use of the compound according to Claim 1 for the preparation of a medicament useful in the treatment or prevention of cancer in a mammal in need of such treatment.
